Name: The Gold Rush
Ingredients: 5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The name refers to this sweet 'n' sour, zesty ginger cocktail's golden hue. Bourbon provides the base, while lemon and lime balance the warming, rich ginger liqueur and honey (which replaced sugar syrup in our previous version of this recipe in January 2024).
Nutrition: One serving of The Gold Rush contains 150 calories
